words.fact: Bill Gates co-founded Microsoft in 1975 and became the world's youngest self-made billionaire at age 31.
Jeff Bezos founded Amazon in 1994 in his garage and transformed it into the world's largest online retailer.
Elon Musk co-founded PayPal and leads Tesla, SpaceX, and several other innovative technology companies.
Mark Zuckerberg founded Facebook (now Meta) from his Harvard dorm room in 2004 at age 19.
Larry Page co-founded Google with Sergey Brin in 1998 and served as CEO of Alphabet Inc.
Larry Ellison co-founded Oracle Corporation in 1977, creating one of the world's largest software companies.
Satya Nadella became Microsoft's CEO in 2014 and led the company's transformation to cloud computing.
